statements: SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT collection_date, driver_id FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE truck_id = 3;
SELECT id, route_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE driver_id = 5;
SELECT id, truck_id FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE collection_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT route_id, collection_date, truck_id, driver_id FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, collection_date FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT driver_id, route_id FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT route_id) AS num_routes FROM waste_collection_schedule GROUP BY truck_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE driver_id = 4 AND truck_id = 2 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule;
SELECT collection_date, collection_time FROM waste_collection_schedule ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT route_id, total_distance FROM collection_route ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_route WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT driver_id, route_name FROM waste_collection_schedule JOIN collection_route ON waste_collection_schedule.route_id = collection_route.route_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM collection_route WHERE total_distance > 50.00;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE driver_id = 5;
SELECT route_id, total_distance FROM collection_route WHERE start_location = 'City Hall' ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time, driver_id FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedules;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_route FROM WasteCollectionSchedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, vehicle_id, driver_id FROM CollectionRoutes WHERE route_name = 'Route A';
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE driver_id = 'e3d3c7b0-6c49-4eb8-bc3a-44a629ee4b26';
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS TotalAllocations FROM ResourceAllocation GROUP BY route_id HAVING TotalAllocations > 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE collection_route = 'Route A';
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_route FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;

SELECT s.schedule_id, r.route_name, ra.allocated_resource FROM WasteCollectionSchedules s JOIN CollectionRoutes r ON s.collection_route = r.route_id JOIN ResourceAllocation ra ON r.route_id = ra.route_id WHERE ra.allocated_resource = 'Truck';
SELECT COUNT(route_id) AS route_count, SUM(allocated_resource) AS total_resources FROM ResourceAllocation GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_resources > 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, driver_id, vehicle_id FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, vehicle_id, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_name = 'East Route';
SELECT route_id, route_name, driver_id, vehicle_id, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, driver_id, vehicle_id, collection_points, route_id FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_id > 5 AND driver_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE driver_id = 3 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(route_id) AS max_route_id, MIN(route_id) AS min_route_id FROM waste_collection_routes;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedules
SELECT id, location FROM waste_collection_schedules
SELECT team_name, driver_name, vehicle_assigned FROM waste_collection_teams
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_collection_routes
SELECT collection_date, team_id, route_id FROM waste_collection_logs
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedules WHERE location ='Main Street'
SELECT id, location, collection_day FROM waste_collection_schedules ORDER BY collection_day DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' AND end_location = 'Suburbia'
SELECT team_name, driver_name, vehicle_type FROM waste_collection_teams INNER JOIN waste_collection_vehicles ON waste_collection_teams.vehicle_assigned = waste_collection_vehicles.vehicle_id
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE route_id = waste_collection_routes.id) AS num_logs FROM waste_collection_routes
